name: The Village (itch) (Devlin McClure)
description:
The controls mimic that of a real Gameboy:

Up - Up Arrow / W

Down - Down Arrow / S

Left - Left Arrow / A

Right - Right Arrow / D

A - Alt / Z / J

B - Ctrl / K / X

Start - Enter

Select - Shift

Also playable on mobile in the browser

The Village is a small interactive experience about a small village in the middle of a war torn country. This was made in 72 hours as apart of the Gamedev@IU May 2019 Game Jam using GB Studio. The game can be played in the browser, or downloaded to be used as a Gameboy ROM.

Created by Devlin McClure and Jon Roehr

Assets used:

4 Colour Interior Tileset by stealthix

4 Colour Overworld Tileset by stealthiz

1-Bit Pack by Kenney
